### Remotely Piloted Aircraft System – Infrastructure
#### Solicitation Number: GW001035-78764

#### Date of Publication: Tuesday, October 18, 2022
#### Tender Closing Date: Tuesday, November 22, 2022 2:00:00 PM (Local Time)

#### Amendment Number: 1
#### Amendment Date: Wednesday, November 4, 2022

#### Description:
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified design-build teams to submit proposals for the design and construction of the new Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) – Infrastructure Air Maintenance Detachment (East) (AMDet(E)) facility in Greenwood, Nova Scotia.

#### Services:
Design and construction of the RPAS – Infrastructure AMDet(E) facility, including the necessary infrastructure and equipment.

#### Requirements:
As per the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), please ensure that the following requirements are included in the proposal:

* Estimated quantity of commodity: Not Applicable
* Duration of contract: December 21, 2022 to April 28, 2028

#### Scope:
The scope of work includes the design and construction of the RPAS – Infrastructure AMDet(E) facility, which includes the necessary infrastructure and equipment.

#### Criteria for Evaluation:
The proposals will be evaluated based on the criteria established in the RFP documents.

#### Contact Information:
For any questions or concerns, please contact Andrew Webster, Procurement Specialist, at (343) 553-9546 or andrew.webster@dcc-cdc.gc.ca.

#### Attachments:
No attachments are provided.

#### Currency of the Contract:
The contract will be awarded in Canadian dollars.

#### G-SIN Descriptions:

* Architect/Engineer Services - Airfield, Communication and Missile Facilities
* Hangars, Helicopter, Telescopic, Shipboard (Custom Engineered)
* Hangars, Helicopter, Telescopic (Custom Engineered)

* GD
* SRV
